@rova1 wrote:

that doesn’t make sense to me, since it appears like 50 times, eg:

if((AttackingOn2.secs > 0) && (secs <= 0)) {
sM("Someone else is already fighting your opponent.");
ResetAttack();
return false;
}
if(GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 8) == false){
sM("You are too far to mage your enemy!");
ResetAttack();
return false;
}

Etc… etc.

I have followed this tut a few times now and I’m sure I followed it correctly (I’m not dumb) but it hasn’t worked. I’m trying to make KBD lair level 130 wilderness but it’s still a safe area (well safe from players)

item.title: Pking Areas [317 DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @kilop kilop
item.description:
@kilop wrote:

[center][size=14pt]Everything in this tut is in your client.java[/size][/center]

[center]Multi Pking[/center]
Search for

public boolean multiCombat() {

You should get something that looks like this

public boolean multiCombat() { if((absX >= 3144 && absX <= 3184 && absY >= 3519 && absY <=3656) || (absX >= 3185 && absX <= 3350 && absY >= 3502 && absY <=3900) || (absX >= 2983 && absX <= 3007 && absY >= 3905 && absY <=3917) || (absX >= 3007 && absX <= 3075 && absY >= 3608 && absY <=3713) || (absX >= 2944 && absX <= 2963 && absY >= 3812 && absY <=3827) || (absX >= 3041 && absX <= 3057 && absY >= 3869 && absY <=3883) || (absX >= 3157 && absX <= 3181 && absY >= 3874 && absY <=3895) || (absX >= 2720 && absX <= 2760 && absY >= 5073 && absY <=5114) || (absX >= 2256 && absX <= 2287 && absY >= 4680 && absY <=4711) || (absX >= 2360 && absX <= 2445 && absY >= 5045 && absY <= 5125) || (absX >= 2760 && absX <= 2780 && absY >= 2790 && absY <=2810) || (absX >= 2624 && absX <= 2690 && absY >= 2550 && absY <=2619) || (absX >= 3460 && absX <= 3520 && absY >= 9470 && absY <=9530) || (absX >= 2371 && absX <= 2424 && absY >= 5125 && absY <=5167) || (absX >= 2627 && absX <= 2677 && absY >= 4550 && absY <=4602) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3307 && absY >= 3904 && absY <=3952) || (absX >= 2420 && absX <= 2520 && absY >= 10100 && absY <=10200) || (absX >= 2992 && absX <= 3090 && absY >= 4804 && absY <=4872))
Then go into the corners where you want the pk area to be and find your absX and absY and add this into the code

(absX >= XXLL && absX <= XXHH && absY >= YYLL && absY <=YYHH) ||

XXLL means that the absX’s last two numbers have to be lower then the XXHH last two numbers and YYLL means your absY’s last two numbers has to be lower then the YYHH last two numbers.

If you get an error, then its

(absX >= XXHH && absX <= XXLL && absY >= YYHH && absY <=YYLL) ||

XXHH means that your absX’s last two numbers has to be higher then XXLL’s last two. And YYHH means your absY’s last two numbers has to be higher then YYLL’s last two.

Then add this under that, or maybe under other things like any “isin” coordinates.

[code]public boolean isInYourPk() { if((absX >= XXXX && absX <= XXXX && absY >= YYYY && absY <=YYYY)) return true; else return false; }
Change the XXXX and YYYY to your coordinates.

Now, find

ResetAttack();

And add above the “break;” add

if(isInYourPk()){ wildyLevel = 130; <---- Change the wilderness level to whatever you like }

Now search for (ctrl + F)

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX

And you should find this,

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {

Under that put,

if(isInYourPk()) return true;

Then search for,

sM("Other player is busy at the moment."); break; }

Under that put,

if(isInYourPk()) { wildyLevel = 200;<---- Change the wilderness level to whatever you like }

Then search for,

int level = ((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1;

Under that put this,

if(isInYourPk()){level = 200;} <---- Change the wilderness level to whatever you like

[center]1v1 Pking[/center]

Under one of those add this,

public boolean isInYourPk() { if((absX >= XXXX && absX <= XXXX && absY >= YYYY && absY <=YYYY)) return true; else return false; }
Change the XXXX and YYYY to your coordinates.

Then search for

ResetAttack(); return false;

Then under that, add this

if(isInYourPk()){ wildyLevel = 130; <---- Change the wilderness level to whatever you like }

Then search for,

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX

And you should find this,

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {

Under that put,

if(isInYourPk()) return true;

Then search for,

sM("Other player is busy at the moment."); break; }

Under that put,

if(isInYourPk()) { wildyLevel = 200;<---- Change the wilderness level to whatever you like }

Then search for,

sM("You don't have enough runes to cast this spell."); }

Under that put this,

if(isInYourPk()) { wildyLevel = 200;<---- Change the wilderness level to whatever you like }

Then search for,

int level = ((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1;

Under that put this,

if(isInYourPk()){level = 200;} <---- Change the wilderness level to whatever you like
And then compile and run. It should work.
Leave some feedback!

Read full topic
